definition: to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Instantaneousness has dismembered eternality and beauty has been materialized.
sentences.chinese: 瞬間支解了永恆，美被物化了。

sentences.english: The Benefit is based on your age at time of Death or Dismemberment.
sentences.chinese: 好處是根據您的年齡的死亡時間或支解。

definition: flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
too horrible to endure (idiom); tragic spectacle/appalling scenes of devastation
